channel.title: Logout message [delta]
channel.description: How can i set a message if some1 logs out on my server? THX

item.title: Logout message [delta]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:21, topic:391467”] [code] public void logout() {

            try {
                    killMyNPCs();
                    if(inPitsGame){
                    inPitsGame = false;
                    PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
                    }
                   talk(playerName + " has logged out.");
                    resetfollowers();
                    savegame(true);
                   
                    disconnected = true;
                    if(this != null) {
                            outStream.createFrame(109);
                            flushOutStream();
                    }
            } catch (Exception Ex_) {
            }
    }

[/code]I think…[/quote]

No, because when he added it to the logout() method, he said it was printing it twice then. It means that somewhere else in the code, it’s already printing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Logout message [delta]
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

[code] public void logout() {

	try {
		killMyNPCs();
		if(inPitsGame){
		inPitsGame = false;
		PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
		}
		yell(""+playerName+" has logged out.");  //Log out message
		resetfollowers();
		savegame(true);
		
		disconnected = true;
		if(this != null) {
			outStream.createFrame(109);
			flushOutStream();
		}
	} catch (Exception Ex_) {
	}
}

[/code]

Read full topic
